code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import'./ProductDisplay.css';import{ShopContext}from'../../Context/ShopContext';import closebutton from'../Assets/closebutton.png';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const ProductDisplay=props=>{const{product}=props;const{addToCart}=useContext(ShopContext);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-display",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"product-display-left",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"product-display-img",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"product-display-main-img",src:product.image,alt:""})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-display-right",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/knives",className:"close-button",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:closebutton,width:"30",height:"30",alt:""})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-price",children:["$",product.knife_price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-description",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Description"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:product.description})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-wear",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Select Wear"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"wear-options",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{children:"Factory New"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{children:"Minimal Wear"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{children:"Field Tested"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{children:"Well-Worn"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{children:"Battle-Scarred"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"add-to-cart",onClick:()=>addToCart(product.id),children:"ADD TO CART"})]})]});};export default ProductDisplay;
